ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Did He not find you wandering and guide you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Did He not find you perplexed, and show you the way?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Did He not find you unaware of the Right Way, and then directed you to it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Did He not find you wandering about and give you guidance?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And found you deeply engrossed in His love, so directed you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And He found you unaware and guided you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And find you lost (that is, unrecognized by men) and guide (them to you)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Did He not find thee erring, and guide thee?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Did He not find thee wandering and direct (thee)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Did He not find you wandering, and give you guidance?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And He found thee wandering, so He guided thee,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Did He not find you astray, and guide you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And He found thee wandering, and He gave thee guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And He found you unaware (of the Quran, its legal laws, and Prophethood, etc.) and guided you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Did He not find you a wanderer so He guided you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And found you wandering, and guided you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And He found you lost and guided [you],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [93:7] And did He not find you erring, from the [revealed] Law which you [now] follow, and guided you?, that is, and then guided you to it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Gabriel then said: (Did He not find thee) O Muhammad (wandering) among people in error (and direct (thee)) and guided you by means of prophethood? The Prophet (pbuh) said: "Yes, O Gabriel!" 761
